item.title: Crypto Payment Gateway for E-commerce Applications
item.description: Live Deployment: Click Here Github Link: Click Here Devfolio Writeup: Click Here Payment Gateway Nowadays many business small or big has started accepting UPI Payments , in future as crypto starts to be more accepted we might see businesses & e-commerce websites start accepting Crypto as a form of payment on any purchase. The problem Pegasas Payment Gateway solves With Pegasas payment gateway, we aim to make it more accessible for a beginner to integrate Crypto payments with a few lines of code and grow their business.
